items.title: The great e-bike crackdown has begun
items.summary: This is The Stepback, a weekly newsletter breaking down one essential story from the tech world. For more on the e-bike movement, follow Andrew J. Hawkins. The Stepback arrives in our subscribers' inboxes at 8AM ET. Opt in for The Stepback here. How it started Last week, I did something I don't typâ€¦

items.summary: An immense sense of isolation underscores Ian Tuasonâ€™s feature debut, the audio-driven horror smorgasbord â€œUndertone.â€ Following an exhausted horror podcast host watching over her motherâ€™s deathbed, the film is initially terrifying thanks to its undercurrent of pulsing grief, rendered with subtletyâ€¦

items.title: HyperX Cloud Alpha 2 Wireless Review: 250-hour battery life and simultaneous dual-wireless connectivity
items.summary: HyperX's Cloud Alpha 2 is a wireless over-ear headset with several impressive features: up to 250 hours of battery life, simultaneous dual-wireless connectivity, and a customizable desktop base station.

items.title: Open-source Intel 486 mobo built from scratch in under 6 months for i486 chips â€” M8SBC-486's goal was to achieve Linux and Doom compatibility, but it achieves far more than that
items.summary: An enthusiast has showcased an open-source Intel 486 motherboard that they claim was 'made from scratch' in under six months.

items.title: Scorchers crush Sixers to win sixth Big Bash title
items.summary: Perth Scorchers extend their record as the most successful men's Big Bash League franchise, beating Sydney Sixers by six wickets to win their sixth title.

items.title: Sabalenka sets tie-break record to reach last eight
items.summary: Aryna Sabalenka surpasses Novak Djokovic's Open era record of consecutive tie-breaks won at Grand Slams to set up a quarter-final with Iva Jovic.

items.title: Modder turns RTX 2080 Ti Hall of Fame into a supercharged 900W Titan RTX with transplanted core and memory â€” fully unlocked TU102 die with a 900W power limit hits 18k on 3DMark TimeSpy Extreme
items.summary: RTX 2080 Ti Hall of Fame graphics card gets transplanted with a Titan RTX core and 24GB of GDDR6 memory. Paired with a 900W power limit modification, the card achieved a TimeSpy Extreme score better than an RTX 3090 on air.

items.title: Fulham make Â£28m bid to sign PSV forward Pepi
items.summary: Fulham make a Â£28m bid to sign United States forward Ricardo Pepi from Dutch club PSV Eindhoven.

items.title: Ireland win Italy series with Tector's unbeaten 96
items.summary: Harry Tector's career-best 96 not out guides Ireland to a 24-run win over Italy and gives them an unassailable 2-0 lead in their three-game T20 series.

items.title: Alcaraz cruises to 14th Grand Slam quarter-final
items.summary: A straight-set win over American seed Tommy Paul takes world number one Carlos Alcaraz into a 14th Grand Slam quarter-final at the Australian Open.

items.title: Van Dijk wants 'very important' Robertson to stay
items.summary: Liverpool captain Virgil van Dijk says he wants Andy Robertson, who is a target for Tottenham, to stay at the club as he remains a "very important" member of the squad.

items.title: Gaming PC charges you quarters every time you want to power it on, restoring oldest form of microtransactions â€” $135 in tools and supplies, plus a lifetime supply of quarters to kick it old school
items.summary: A YouTube engineer has built a coin-operated power switch for a gaming PC, allowing users to pay for the privilege of turning on their own PC's â€” which is unfortunately not a cry too distant from encroaching reality.

items.title: Enthusiast strips GPU cooler to run sub-zero water through its heatpipes, drops temps to 13C â€” Modded, liquid-cooled RTX 2060 maintains 13C in gaming & unlocks higher boost clocks
items.summary: A GPU running ice-cold water through its heatpipes without being a part of a massive liquid-nitrogen-fueled overclocking session is not something you see every day. That's exactly what TrashBench did by cutting up an RTX 2060's heatsink and attaching his own tubes to the cooler to push sub-zero liqâ€¦

items.title: Mensik withdrawal sends Djokovic into last eight
items.summary: Novak Djokovic moves through to the Australian Open quarter-finals as fourth-round opponent Jakub Mensik pulls out with an abdominal injury.

items.title: Glentoran versus Cliftonville postponed

items.title: Livingston to report Aberdeen over alleged racial abuse of Bokila
items.summary: Livingston will contact the Scottish FA to report Aberdeen over an alleged racial comment made to striker Jeremy Bokila.

items.title: Boro set marker & Wrexham show play-off credentials - Sam Parkin's EFL takeaways
items.summary: Final Score EFL pundit Sam Parkin reflects on the highs and lows after Saturday's action.

items.title: Tired Liverpool players 'falling over their own feet' - Slot
items.summary: Liverpool manager Arne Slot believes his players were incredibly tired in their defeat against Bournemouth, to the extent Jeremy Frimpong was "falling over his own feet" after coming off.

items.title: Adli's stoppage-time winner ends Liverpool unbeaten run in thriller
items.summary: Amine Adli scores a stoppage-time winner as Bournemouth end Liverpool's 13-game unbeaten run in a thrilling match at Vitality Stadium.

items.title: Bowen leads West Ham to important win over Sunderland
items.summary: A fantastic first-half performance helps West Ham blow away Sunderland and move to within two points of 17th-placed Nottingham Forest and safety.

items.title: Late Romero header rescues draw for Tottenham at Burnley
items.summary: Cristian Romero rescues a point for Tottenham Hotspur late on just as under-pressure head coach Thomas Frank faced further embarrassment against struggling Burnley at Turf Moor.

items.title: Marmoush scores as Man City return to winning ways against Wolves
items.summary: Omar Marmoush scores his first Premier League goal of the season to help Manchester City return to winning ways by easing past bottom side Wolves at Etihad Stadium.

items.title: Late Wilson free-kick completes Fulham comeback win over Brighton
items.summary: Harry Wilson scores a spectacular late free-kick as Fulham come from behind to defeat Brighton at Craven Cottage.

items.title: 'Joyless and toxic' - will Spurs put Frank out of his misery?
items.summary: Tottenham manager Thomas Frank remains in deep trouble despite his side rescuing a late draw at Burnley, writes Phil McNulty.

items.title: WSL title probably gone for Chelsea, says Bompastor
items.summary: Sonia Bompastor claims the Women's Super League title is "probably gone" for Chelsea - BBC Sport examines whether that means they will shift their focus.

But he doesn't just share data about what is selling the most; as â€¦

items.title: Zotac reportedly cancels GPU orders and raises MSRP by $200 or more across the board â€” the company blames 'system error' for cancellations
items.summary: Zotac is said to have hiked prices on multiple Nvidia RTX GPUs, with one user claiming that the company canceled their order before the MSRP increase.

items.title: iQOO 15 Ultra confirmed to feature shoulder triggers with 600Hz sampling rate and haptic feedback
items.summary: The iQOO 15 Ultra will launch in China next month, and images iQOO shared recently revealed its design and color options. These images also showed the iQOO 15 Ultra's right frame with touch-sensitive shoulder triggers, which we now know will have haptic feedback. This revelation comes through a Weiâ€¦

items.title: Get ready for the AI ad-pocalypse
items.summary: Of course ad agencies love AI commercials, this Kalshi ad only cost $2,000 to make. I'll confess, with no shame whatsoever, that I really love ads. Artsy ones, funny ones, weird ones, emotional ones - TV commercials were my childhood TikTok before any of us were using terms like "short-form video."â€¦

items.title: This coming-of-age adventure game made me feel a little too seen
items.summary: There's a lot about Perfect Tides: Station to Station's Mara that I find relatable. Like me, she's recently moved to a place simply called "the City" from the middle of nowhere, and like me, she's an avid writer. But these biographical details aren't the important thing; it's the way she's painted â€¦

items.title: Gemini with Personal Intelligence is awfully familiar
items.summary: I respect Gemini using the royal â€œweâ€ here. By lots of metrics, Gemini is winning. It has raced ahead of OpenAI, become scarily good at creating convincing imagery, and even won Apple's business. So last week's news that it was enabling something called Personal Intelligence felt like a victory lapâ€¦

items.title: New AI data center buildout being done in secret location to avoid backlash from local residents â€” ex-crypto mining company doesnâ€™t want publicity for its latest project
items.summary: Applied Digital is apparently keeping the location of its new 430 MW secret at the moment to give the town where it's building it time to adjust for "national media attention."

items.title: MSI MPG X870E Edge Ti Wifi Review: Silver-white aesthetic meets budget X870E
items.summary: MSI MPG X870E Edge Ti WiFi delivers USB4, Wi-Fi 7, 5GbE, dual PCIe 5.0 M.2, and strong performance in a stylish $299 X870E board.

items.title: Retro gamer resurrects Nintendo Wii Food Channel, uses Wii console to order Dominoâ€™s Pizza â€” the WiiLink project is the magic ingredient
items.summary: Nintendo's 20-year-old Wii console is still useful for making online Dominoâ€™s Pizza orders in the U.S. and Canada.

items.title: GB's Brookes and Atkin claim X Games golds
items.summary: Great Britain's Zoe Atkin claims her second X Games freeski title and Mia Brookes wins gold in the women's snowboard slopestyle competition in Aspen, Colorado.

items.title: vivo V70 Elite's specs and design surface
items.summary: vivo is set to unveil the X200T in India on January 27, and, if rumors are to be believed, the brand will introduce the V70 and V70 Elite there next month. While vivo hasn't divulged anything about the V70 series yet, a render of the V70 Elite has surfaced online, revealing its design. According toâ€¦

items.title: Jensen laments buying Mercedes for his parents with Nvidia stock that would be worth $1.33 billion today â€” founder cashed out some stock after 1999 IPO to buy his parents a $135,000 S-Class
items.summary: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang laments selling some of his stock in the company to buy a Mercedes Benz S-Class for his parents in 1999. They are said to still have the vehicle in their possession, although they also regret the gift.

items.title: Google, OpenAI, and Anthropic are competing to see whose AI can play PokÃ©mon the best â€” Twitch streams of beloved RPG game test the models' true might
items.summary: Twitch streams of different AI models playing old PokÃ©mon games have garnered hundreds of thousands of comments as the audience watches robots try to emulate human thinking. Unlike Pong or its derivatives, a game like PokÃ©mon is much more complex, requiring risk assessment and logical reasoning, alâ€¦

items.title: Atari ST enthusiast announces the MiniST with FPGA, MiSTeryNano core, and black TKL case â€” priced at around $400 each, but the initial run is a mere five units
items.summary: An Atari computer enthusiast is planning to produce a new TKL-sized FPGA-powered remake dubbed the MiniST.

items.title: China reveals 200-strong AI drone swarm that can be controlled by a single soldier â€” â€˜intelligent algorithmâ€™ allows individual units to cooperate autonomously even after losing communication with operator
items.summary: The People's Liberation Army revealed its latest drone swarm tech with 200 units that's resistant to jamming, can make autonomous decisions, and is controlled by a single soldier.

items.title: iQOO 15R's key specs revealed by Geekbench
items.summary: iQOO will launch the iQOO 15R in India soon. The brand gave us a glimpse of 15R's design but hasn't divulged any specs yet. However, thanks to Geekbench, we know what chipset the iQOO 15R will have under the hood. The iQOO 15R, having model code I2508, is listed on the Geekbench database with an ocâ€¦

items.title: Heart surgery & darkest nights - the unbreakable 'Baltic Gladiator'
items.summary: Modestas Bukauskas' "whole life has all been about mental resilience" as the UFC fighter tells BBC Sport his remarkable story.

items.title: Surviving bombs and hunger to become a professional tennis player
items.summary: Tennis is seen as a rich sport. But many stars, including Novak Djokovic and Elina Svitolina, have forged successful careers from humble beginnings.

items.title: Tottenham, Bayern and a stand made of chairs - Palhinha's story
items.summary: On-loan Tottenham midfielder Joao Palhinha chats to BBC Sport's Kelly Somers about his life and career.

items.title: Poco X8 Pro Iron Man Edition gets certified ahead of launch
items.summary: The Poco X7 Pro launched back in January of last year, so its successor is definitely coming very soon. In fact, the Poco X8 Pro was already certified in July. Now a new certification reveals that there will be a special edition of the handset: the Poco X8 Pro Iron Man Edition, undoubtedly in partnâ€¦

items.title: Samsung's Galaxy S26 series may support Google's Scam Detection
items.summary: A new report based on code inside the Phone by Google app claims Samsung will add Google's Scam Detection to the Galaxy S26 series, due to be unveiled next month. Scam Detection powered by on-device Gemini Nano AI has so far been exclusive to the Pixel 9 and Pixel 10 families, and it's only availabâ€¦

items.title: Motorola Edge 70 Fusion stops by Geekbench ahead of its introduction
items.summary: A few days ago, a full list of purported specs of the upcoming Motorola Edge 70 Fusion got leaked, and today it looks like someone in possession of a prototype had it run Geekbench. This has resulted in the benchmark's online database having a record of the device, complete with details about its câ€¦

items.title: Our favorite gaming headset gets a 50% price cut for a limited time â€” Razer's BlackShark V2 Pro (2023) drops to $100
items.summary: TKTK

items.title: Infinix Smart 20's chipset, RAM, screen resolution and battery capacity revealed
items.summary: Infinix recently launched the Note Edge, which we're currently in the process of reviewing, and is also due to unveil the Note 60 series soon, of which the Note 60 Ultra is designed by Pininfarina. That said, the brand is also continuing to focus on entry-level offerings, and the upcoming Smart 20 â€¦

items.title: GPU price tracking 2026: Lowest price on every graphics card from Nvidia, AMD, and Intel today â€” here are the best deals during the AI-driven pricing crisis
items.summary: Check the best prices on Nvidia RTX and AMD Radeon graphics cards.

items.title: Apple once again rumored to partner with Intel for chip manufacturing
items.summary: In early December, we first heard that Apple was talking to Intel about chip manufacturing, in a bid to diversify its suppliers and not be entirely dependent on TSMC. Now a new research note by GF Securities analyst Jeff Pu reiterates this rumor. Pu says he expects Intel to begin making Apple chipsâ€¦

items.title: Here's what the Xiaomi Tag looks like, main specs spotted in HyperOS code
items.summary: Last month, a report claimed the Xiaomi Tag was in development, basically intended to be the Chinese company's version of Apple's AirTag and Motorola's Moto Tag. If you've been wondering what it would look like, today's leak sheds some light on just that. Buried in code for Xiaomi's HyperOS Androidâ€¦

items.title: Intel Q4 earnings reveal rocky path to recovery following weakest full-year revenue since 2010 â€” Intel Foundry losses continue as 18A begins ramp, but supply challenges set to ease in Q2 2026
items.summary: Intel's management stabilized the company in 2025, but after posting rather good results in Q4, the company claims that it will face supply constraints in Q1 2026.

items.title: Google Photos can now make you a meme star
items.summary: The latest feature to be added to Google Photos has the potential to be its most successful in a very long time. Basically, the service now lets you create memes in which you're the star. It really is as straightforward as it sounds, the only caveat being that the feature, called Me Meme, is right â€¦

items.title: Alibaba plans IPO for chip-arm T-Head to help bankroll ambitious AI infrastructure investments â€” company to go up against Cambricon and Huawei to capture domestic accelerator market
items.summary: A new report claims that Alibaba's chip manufacturing business, T-head, is preparing to IPO. It's likely that Alibaba is pinning its hopes on T-head to raise capital for the company's domestic AI accelerator solutions, and to fund further infrastructure projects.

items.title: Nvidia reportedly cuts program designed to keep gaming GPUs near MSRP pricing â€” end of OPP pricing-support scheme does not bode well for gamers
items.summary: The OPP program allegedly allowed Nvidia's board partners to sell GPUs at MSRP.
